stimulusHtml: To give his work, such as Old Man's Cloth, the appearance of a flowing tapestry, El Anatsui uses
choicesHtml: pounded bark fiber that has been woven into a sheet and painted
flattened labels from liquor bottle-caps fastened together with copper wire
handmade paper scrolls covered with invented characters and symbols
saffron-colored fabric that is draped from a metal gateway
